title: Mentoring and helping developers to grow.
description: I've worked for several years as a lead developer and had the chance to collaborate with some great people. In my daily time I split my time between coding, conducting code reviews, helping and guiding my team. I work closely with the product people to translate their needs into technical requirements.

title: Autonomous and experienced working in remote environments.
description: I have led projects from start to finish. From frontend and backend to setting up CI/CD and organizing the development flows. Worked in agile environments and scrum methodologies.

title: Strong analytical point of view.
description: From identifying the problem to deciding on the best solution I've helped in discovery, conducted multiple interviews with domain experts and led the engineering part.

title: Sensitive about UX/UI design.
description: Worked closely with designers to create and maintain design systems. Familiar with atomic design principles and tools like Storybook and Figma. Still learning about accessibility and semantics.

title: Domain-Driven Design.
description: Eric Evans changed my whole perception about programming. If my code speaks the same language as your business then I did my job right.

title: Excellent knowledge of object-oriented programming.
description: Worked with various MVC frameworks in my career I have strong knowledge and understanding of OOP principals.
